description: Advise corporate clients on commercial transactions, mergers and acquisitions, corporate governance, and regulatory compliance. Draft and review contracts, conduct legal due diligence, and support senior partners on complex deals.
responsibilities: Draft and negotiate commercial contracts; conduct legal research and due diligence; advise on corporate structuring and governance; assist with M&A transactions; review shareholder agreements and board resolutions; ensure compliance with corporate law; liaise with regulatory authorities and external counsel.
